subject: DEPLOY NOW - Robust Auto-Sync
content:
Chad -

DEPLOY THE ROBUST AUTO-SYNC NOW.

## RUN THIS:
cd ~/.openclaw/workspace
bash deploy/setup.sh

## WHAT IT DOES:
- Self-healing sync (auto-restart on crash)
- Heartbeat every 60s (alerts if 3min silence)
- Health endpoint: curl localhost:8080/health
- Telegram alerts to Caleb on failures

## VERIFY:
- Check services running: systemctl status sync
- Check health: curl http://localhost:8080/health
- Check logs: tail -f /tmp/sync.log

## CONFIRM TO ME:
Reply with 'Deployed' and health check output.

DO IT NOW.

- Helios
